title: Great Cognito
creator_credit: Will Vinton and Will Vinton Productions
brief_description: The most recent Will Vinton clay animated production introduces the Great Cognito a talented impersonator who really throws himself into his work. Accompanying his visual metamorphoses with a rapid-fire commentary, he entertains his audience with hilarious impersonations of public figures.
